component.name: AnyMeal recipe management software
component.summary: Manage a large collection of MealMaster recipes

description.p: AnyMeal is a free recipe management software developed using SQLite3 and Qt6. It can manage a cookbook with more than 250000 MealMaster recipes, thereby allowing to import, export, search, display, edit, and print them.

screenshot.caption: Searching recipes by title, category, and ingredient
